FOUNDATIONAL DAILY PROTOCOLS CHECKLIST

The 5 non-negotiable protocols that run every single day, regardless of mode.

üìç WHERE AM I?

Interactive daily checklist for the 5 core foundational protocols (Water, Pills, Capture, Sleep Anchor, Daily Dump). This is your baseline‚Äîcomplete these every day before anything else.

‚úÖ WHAT CAN I DO HERE?

  • Check boxes as you complete each protocol step (saves automatically)
  • Print this page for physical tracking (print icon in browser)
  • Review priority hierarchy if protocols are failing
  • Return daily for fresh tracking (resets each day)

üí° HOW THIS HELPS

Neurodivergent brains need external structure when executive function fails. This checklist removes decision-making: just follow the sequence. Checking boxes provides dopamine hits and visual progress tracking. If you skip these protocols, everything else falls apart.

‚ö° QUICK ACCESS

  • Daily Tracker ‚Üí Full tracking
  • All Checklists ‚Üí Other protocols
  • Full SOP ‚Üí Details
  • Emergency ‚Üí When stuck

MORNING SEQUENCE (Fixed Order)

6:00 AM - Wake & Water Protocol

6:02 AM - Pill Protocol

ALL-DAY PROTOCOL (Active 6:00 AM - 10:30 PM)

Capture Protocol (Always Running)

When any thought, idea, or task enters your mind:

Note: Processing happens during ‚ÄúPlanning & Filing‚Äù time block or Weekly Review

EVENING SEQUENCE (Fixed Order)

10:00 PM - Sleep Anchor Prep

10:25 PM - Daily Dump

10:30 PM - Sleep Anchor

SUCCESS CRITERIA

‚úì All 5 protocols executed in sequence
‚úì No protocols skipped or delayed
‚úì Captured all fleeting thoughts throughout day
‚úì In bed at 10:30 PM with 7-8 hour sleep window

PRIORITY HIERARCHY REMINDER

If you‚Äôre struggling with any protocol, check these first:

  1. Sleep - Did I get 7-8 hours last night?
  2. Food - Have I eaten protein in the last 3 hours?
  3. Water - Have I had 16+ oz today?
  4. Medicine - Did I take my pills this morning?

Cannot fix executive function if these 4 are failing.
